prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with vibrant green colors and a cute, round body.
Generate a forest-dwelling Pokemon that has a distinct caterpillar shape and soft features.
Design a tiny, playful creature that resembles a caterpillar, with bright yellow and green shades.
Show me a Pokemon that evolves from a small caterpillar into a magnificent butterfly.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in grassy areas, with a charming and friendly personality.
Give me a Pokemon that resembles a caterpillar, featuring large eyes and a segmented body.
Make a Pokemon with a gentle nature, often found crawling on leaves in the woods.
